This vehicle is exempt.  Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL this vehicle is exempt from London Road User Charging.
This may change without notice. You can continue to apply for the Auto Pay service.
This vehicle is already on an Auto Pay service and can't be added again. If it is not on your service please call 0343 222 2222 ( TfL call charges ).
You can't add this vehicle - please call us on 0343 222 2222 ( TfL call charges ).
